text: Dark Passion Play is the sixth album by the Finnish symphonic metal group Nightwish. == Track listing == # «The Poet and the Pendulum» - 13:54 # «Bye Bye Beautiful» - 4:14 # «Amaranth» - 3:51 # «Cadence of Her Last Breath» - 4:14 # «Master Passion Greed» - 6:02 # «Eva» - 4:24 # «Sahara» - 5:47 # «Whoever Brings the Night» - 4:17 # «For the Heart I Once Had» - 3:55 # «The Islander» - 5:05 # «Last of the Wilds» - 5:40 # «7 Days to the Wolves» - 7:03 # «Meadows of Heaven» - 7:10 == Personnel == * Anette Olzon – vocals * Tuomas Holopainen – keyboards * Emppu Vuorinen – guitars * Marco Hietala – bass guitar * Jukka Nevalainen – drums Category:2007 albums
title: Dark Passion Play
